title: [RITO THX] Thank you all for the impact you've had on our lives.
body:
My reliable sources at reddit declare today to be League's birthday. Happy Birthday! While [5 years ago](http://timeline.leagueoflegends.com/#) you were watching your fledgling game grow, it has been a year and a day since I began my relationship with another summoner. 

This post serves as a huge thank you for touching our lives. You have given [tens of millions](http://www.forbes.com/sites/insertcoin/2014/01/27/riots-league-of-legends-reveals-astonishing-27-million-daily-players-67-million-monthly/) of people a daily hobby. You have given over a [thousand people](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Riot_Games) an income directly and hundreds more indirectly. You have given the world of gaming a strong push [into the spotlight](http://www.bbc.com/news/business-29684635). You have encouraged a strong [sense of morality](http://www.gamerheadlines.com/2014/10/riot-games-player-behavior/) on the masses that are so notorious for serving up earfuls of disrespect and ignorance.

Thank you for putting up with our daily riotpls™ requests on features and balances *cough* give draven a bleed again *cough*. Thank you for pulling your hair out trying to maintain servers so we don't have to. Thank you for the beautiful and exotic artwork you have given us. Thank you for the [puns](https://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_detailpage&v=ewm5IFUnm4w#t=28) and [memes](http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20140619/1304/announcing-queue-dodge). {{champion:103}} {{champion:64}} appreciate it.

The massive and enveloping way you have touched our lives cannot be fathomed. Gamers love it. Wallets, teachers, and bosses love/hate it. Riot Games everyone. Happy Birthday to your toddler.

How is today League's birthday?? http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/List_of_champions Wouldn't their birthday be the first date of released champs?? February 21st, which would be 8 months ago now. How would its birthday be 8 months after it was created

Wouldn't there have to've been champs during Alpha and Beta?

"Birthdays" for games tend to be based on the full release, which would certainly have been after any testing phase. But the champs would've had to come *before* or *during* such a testing phase, because you can't release a MOBA without any characters to play as.

> Wouldn't there have to've been champs during Alpha and Beta?
> 
> "Birthdays" for games tend to be based on the full release, which would certainly have been after any testing phase. But the champs would've had to come *before* or *during* such a testing phase, because you can't release a MOBA without any characters to play as.

Well he did say "5 years ago". If you include the Beta/Alpha, then that would be 2008, and 6 years ago. So idk.

The actual release date for League, according to their wiki, was [October 27th, 2009](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/League_of_Legends). So 5 years ago today.

Some champions would have been designed before the release date, because there would have to be champions during the testing phases - which occur *before* release. Specifically, from April 10th to October 26th of 2009 for the beta.

But, as I stated before, "birthdays" for games tend to be based on the final release date.
